ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents users from using the stadswonen email address for woonstad cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( ParentId )), FromAddress != $User.Email, ISPICKVAL( Parent.Label__c , 'woonstad'), NOT(CONTAINS( FromAddress , 'woonstad')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You want to send an email from @stadswonenrotterdam.nl, but the case has the label 'Woonstad'. Please select an @woonstadrotterdam.nl email address.
